name: Zargon Prime
description:
Your homeworld is under attack by Zargoid invaders! Pilot your spacefighter through the enemy forces, survive the odds and save your homeworld from total destruction!

DESCRIPTION:
Zargon Prime is an old-school style, vertical shoot'em up in the spirit of Xenon 2, R-Type and Nemesis. Shoot enemies, collect powerups to improve your weapons, and clear all the levels to win.

HOW TO PLAY:
Keyboard: Use the ARROW KEYS or WASD to move your ship, and SPACE to shoot.
Gamepad: Use the LEFT STICK to move your ship, and BUTTON A to shoot.
Press ESC for Pause menu.

Zargon Prime is a single-person student project.
